name: Team building website
info: A company team building project using node.js, built utilising test driven development, using npm packages including jest, inquirer, and an email validator.

name: README generator
info: A README generator which uses Node.js and the inquirer npm pachage to generate a README file based on user inputs with input validators.

name: 5 day weather forecast website
info: A website which provides the current weather and a 5 day forecast using the API from Open Weather Map (https://openweathermap.org/). This site also shows past user searches as buttons on the page.

name: Day scheduler
info: A work day planner where user can type their to-do's into each hour section and save it to local storage for rendering onto the page when refreshed.

name: Javascript quiz
info: A quiz about Javascript using Javascript.

name: Random password generator
info: A Javascript run Password generator. The user can choose: the length of password and the use of different Character types (lowercase characters, uppercase characters, numeric characters, special characters
